EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Palo Alto
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Monday at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow taking place on Monday at the Pivotal Palo Alto office.
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Palo Alto Monday, June 20th, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/paloalto?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-PaloAlto]]>
Location Pivotal Palo Alto <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/paloalto]]> 3495 Deer Creek Road Palo Alto, CA 94304 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/3495+Deer+Creek+Rd,+Palo+Alto,+CA+94304/@37.3942927,-122.1479494,17z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x808fb075bbd49a7f:0x1e85e256254a28d7]]>
Parking Parking is available onsite for free.
Questions? Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <[[mailto:psantos@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you!
The Pivotal Team
